articles.description: The Grammy-winning singer, 41, and her husband, 29, were pictured on a drive in their white Mercedes-Benz SL-Class in Westlake Village.
articles.content:
Britney Spears and her spouse Sam Asghari are sticking together amid tough times.

articles.title: Jamie Foxx Update: Actor Undergoing Physical Rehab in Chicago - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: Jamie Foxx is recovering after his medical emergency at the Shirley Ryan Rehabilitation Hospital in Chicago.
